root: ^“Hello there…I have some evidence that relates to the crime… yes, I am sure.”
^“OK, I will wait here. Please, come quickly.”
^I hope I did not get myself into any trouble…Damn, but this crime is too big to hide.
^Why the police still haven’t come yet.
^Oh, wait, I hear the footsteps. It must be the police.
^“Well, well, well. I really wish you did not press the button and call the police.”
^“You have made a huge mistake here.”
^“Police? You don’t really think they work for justice, do you? ”
^“What happened to them! What did you do to them?!”
^“You and your disgusted group! Not just lure them into your feast party, but also let them eat each other!”
^“Don’t you understand? My people are everywhere…”
^S**T. I have no choice but to fight.
